casebody.data:
Oxford Paint and Hardware, Inc. v. Hubert Baxter et al. (10405)

Landau, Heiman and Freedman, Js.

Argued January 14 decision released February 4, 1992 Raymond A. Desautels III, with whom, on the brief, were Ralph C. Crozier and Allan Friedman, certified legal intern, for the appellant (plaintiff). Frederick W. Krug, for the appellees (defendants). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
